original_prompt: perfect composition, impeccable attention to detail, highest quality, rich detail, sharp focus, 8K/4K resolution, clear edges, exquisite details, perfect composition, depth of field, cinematic lighting, vibrant colors, award-winning style, professional level, perfect depiction. Create an extremely detailed, hyper-realistic 3D graphite pencil sketch depicting the face of a Chinese idol girl, drawn on textured white notebook paper with clear paper quality, delicate details, and subtle imperfections. The facial sketch should be perfectly identical to the reference photo displayed on an iPhone placed next to the notebook. The iPhone screen clearly displays the artist's original portrait photograph with natural reflections and soft sunlight reflections on the glass. The watermark is mandatory and must not be omitted... [水印要求省略]
theme: 超写实素描 / 对比构图 / 创作过程展示
effective_content: 仅30%有效内容，70%为冗余/不可执行指令

subject_variables.main: 3D graphite pencil sketch of Chinese idol girl's face
subject_variables.replaceability_notes: 主体可替换为其他人物/动物/物品的素描

lighting.type: cinematic lighting (矛盾：素描场景不需要电影级打光)
lighting.special_effects: natural reflections, soft sunlight reflections on glass

issues: 矛盾：Gothic handwritten vs Bold Arial
过度具体：10x10像素（AI无法精确控制）
不可执行：AI无法保证像素级精度
watermark_requirements.effective_requirement: watermark in lower left corner with 'ur name' text

sketch_requirement.challenge: 过度要求完美复制，可能限制艺术性

composition.perspective: top-down or slight angle view of workspace
composition.layout: notebook + sketch + iPhone reference side by side

accent_colors: vibrant colors (矛盾：素描应为黑白)

quality_score.clarity_notes: 结构混乱，水印指令淹没核心内容
quality_score.detail_notes: 核心描述有细节，但被冗余词汇稀释
quality_score.reusability_notes: 水印指令过于具体，无法复用；质量词堆砌无意义
quality_score.efficiency_notes: 347词中仅30%有效，70%为冗余/不可执行内容

critical_issues.impact: 稀释有效信息，增加token成本

critical_issues.details: 水印描述占70%篇幅，但AI无法精确控制像素
critical_issues.impact: 淹没核心内容，且无法实现

examples: Gothic handwritten font vs Bold Arial font
graphite sketch (黑白) vs vibrant colors (鲜艳色彩)
critical_issues.impact: AI无法理解意图，随机选择
AI无法保证像素级精度，指令无效

extracted_patterns.structure_type: 反面教材 - 关键词堆砌 + 过度指令
disadvantages: 大量同义词重复，无增益
水印要求不切实际（AI无法控制像素）
what_works: 核心概念清晰：素描 vs 照片对比
材质描述具体：textured white notebook paper
场景设定有创意：iPhone参照对比
extracted_patterns.reusable_core: 3D graphite pencil sketch on {surface} depicting {subject}, with {reference object} showing original photo for comparison

optimization_priority: URGENT - 需要删除70%冗余内容并重组结构
